system.description: When you whisper someone’s name to the world’s psychic maelstrom, roll+weird.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, the MC will ask you 3 questions; answer them truthfully.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a hit, they come to you, with or without any clear explanation why.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a hit, they come to you, with or without any clear explanation why. On a 10+, take +1forward against them.
